rationale: The documentation did not include any mention of the patient's difficulty adhering to the fluticasone/salmeterol regimen due to a busy schedule.
The clinician's suggestion of setting reminders or linking medication intake to daily habits was not documented.
The patient's concern about avoiding a repeat of past asthma exacerbations was not documented.
There was no mention of the clinician's plan to brainstorm additional strategies with the patient.
The documentation failed to include any specific follow-up plan or assessment of the patient's asthma management.
